props.content: Oracle has some great products and applications, but most fo them did not look like they were made by the same company. In the spirit of creating consistency we did an analysis of all of our user interfaces, looked for patterns and common components and at the end developed a massive design system called Redwood.

props.caption: Oracle Redwood Design System sneak peek

props.content:
It was fun develop Oracleâ€™s first design wireframe toolkit during this project. Before we even knew how the design system components would look visually, designers could create mockups for applications and get feedback for their early designs.

Once the visual design was created, designers could convert their wireframes into high definition composition with a click of a button.

We showcased a sneak peek video of Redwood at our design.oracle.com website. It was also a good opportunity to talk a little bit about our design team, culture at Oracle, and to list our career opportunities.
